examples.example: 田野里的水蛭虽然样子奇怪，但也是大自然生态的一部分呢。

translate.english: The leeches in the field, although looking strange, are also a part of the natural ecosystem.

examples.example: 爷爷在给我讲他年轻时候的故事，其中就有水蛭吸在他腿上的趣事。

translate.english: Grandpa is telling me the story of his young age, among which there is an interesting story of a leech sucking on his leg.

examples.example: 今天在生物课上，我了解到了水蛭独特的生物特性和它在医学上的应用价值。

translate.english: Today in the biology class, I learned about the unique biological characteristics of the leech and its application value in medicine.
